summary: The JSON shorthand payload marshaling in api-go fails to properly handle nested empty objects, producing invalid JSON like {"greeting":} instead of {"greeting":{}}.
userImpact: Users passing payloads with nested empty objects to Temporal workflows will experience marshaling errors, resulting in invalid JSON that breaks payload processing.
rootCause: The shorthand JSON marshaling logic in api-go does not correctly handle nested empty objects, omitting the empty braces in the output.
keyQuote: If the payload is something like {"greeting":{}}, it marshals to {"greeting":}
